thread.title: John Terry says Chelsea and Mourinho can thrive in adversity - Hampshire Chronicle
thread.title_full: John Terry says Chelsea and Mourinho can thrive in adversity - Hampshire Chronicle - Discussion on Topix

author: Source: Hampshire Chronicle
title: John Terry says Chelsea and Mourinho can thrive in adversity - Hampshire Chronicle
text:
John Terry has backed Chelsea and Jose Mourinho to bounce back from their tumultuous start to the season and hopes successive clean sheets are the catalyst for a turnaround in fortunes. The Blues captain was restored to the centre of defence for last Saturday's 2-0 defeat of Aston Villa - just a third Premier League win from nine games - and goalless draw at Dynamo Kiev in Ukraine on Tuesday night.
 Hampshire Chronicle.
